Empty aerosol cans can be recycled with metal recycling. Remove the cap and ensure the can is empty.
Plastic lip balm tubes can be recycled if cleaned and cut into small pieces. Check with local facilities for specific recycling programs
Some toothpaste tubes can be recycled if they are cleaned and empty. Check with local recycling programs or use mail-in recycling services
Plastic deodorant containers can be recycled if they are clean and empty. Aerosol deodorant cans can be recycled with metal recycling once empty
Plastic conditioner bottles can be recycled with plastic recycling if they are empty and clean. Check with local recycling guidelines
Plastic mouthwash bottles can be recycled if they are empty and clean. Rinse thoroughly before recycling
Plastic facial cleanser containers can be recycled if they are empty and clean. Check with local recycling programs or use mail-in recycling services
Plastic body wash bottles can be recycled with plastic recycling if they are empty and clean. Check with local recycling guidelines
Glass aftershave bottles can be recycled with glass recycling. Plastic aftershave containers can be recycled with plastic recycling if they are empty and clean
